name: Tic Tac Toe
body:
It is a simple [Tic-Tac-Toe](http://minhaskamal.github.io/TicTacToe) game and you can play with the computer too! The computer has two AI-Players, having two levels of smartness. It is almost impossible to beat the hard level :sunglasses:. The game was first created [in C](https://github.com/MinhasKamal/CoolConsoleGames/blob/master/src/CrissCrossV-2.c), then was rewritten and converted to Java. The actual name of the project was **CrissCross**. ### Views
### Releases - Version 4 - Release Date: 11 Jun 2014 - Version 3 - Release Date: 10 Nov 2013 - Version 2 - Release Date: 08 Jun 2013 ### License
TicTacToe/CrissCross is licensed under a GNU General Public License version-3.
